registration.title: Registration to the competition

meta.title: Registration - Future Symphony Competition
meta.description: Registration to the 3rd "Future Symphony" Competition opens on the 1st of March 2022.

registration.firstStep: As a first step, please submit the following information. You will receive an email from <tt>registration@futuresymphony.lt</tt> with further instructions.
registration.outlookBlocked: Unfortunately, we occasionally encounter problems sending the registration confirmation link to users of Microsoft mail services (<tt>outlook.com</tt>, <tt>live.com</tt>, <tt>hotmail.com</tt>). If you do not receive a confirmation email upon registration, we kindly ask you to use a different service for the registration, or alternatively contact us at <tt>info@futuresymphony.lt</tt> after completing the first registration step. We are sorry for the inconvenience and are working on resolving this issue.
registration.regulationsAccepted: I agree with the Regulations of the Competition and the Privacy Policy.
registration.success: Your registration has been submitted. Please follow the instructions that have been sent to your email address, <tt>{email}</tt>.

resend.alreadyRegistered: If you already registered but can not find the confirmation email, please click
resend.didNotReceive: If you did not receive an email, please click
resend.enterYourEmail: To resend the confirmation link, please enter your email address
resend.success: Success! Please follow the instructions in the confirmation email. If you did not receive an email, please contact us.
resend.notFound: Could not find a registration under this email address. Please check your input or contact us.
resend.sendAgain: To resend the confirmation link again, please click
resend.pleaseWait: Please wait before submitting another request.

registration.editingAllowedUntil: Applications can be submitted and revised until the 30th of June 2022 23:59 EEST (Lithuanian time).
registration.confirmationAfterDeadline: You will receive an email confirming your registration after this deadline.
registration.missingForComplete: Following fields are missing for your registration to be complete:

scoreConfirmations.label: Score submission - agreements
scoreConfirmations.1: I confirm that the submitted piece has not been performed in paid concerts, broadcast on the Internet, radio or television, performed in other competitions or won any prizes.
scoreConfirmations.2: I confirm that the submitted piece meets the score requirements (see section IV of the regulations).
scoreConfirmations.3: I confirm that I will not disclose the authorship of my piece until the announcement of the results of the 2nd round.

form.min30: The score instrumentation requires at least 30 performers.
form.max30: You can choose up to 35 performers.

billingAddress.label: Billing address
billingAddress.placeholder: Street, house no., postcode, city, country

referrer.title: How did you hear about FSC?

error.emailUsed: This email address has already been used. Please choose a different one.
error.invalidForm: An error has occured. Please check your input.
error.pleaseWait: Please wait before submitting another registration.
error.email: An error has occurred while sending the confirmation email. Please try again later, or contact us.
error.fileError: Following files are invalid: {files}. Please check your input and try again.
error.errorOccurred: An error has occurred. Please try again later, or contact us.

validation.fileType: Please select a file with the correct type.

payment.title: Payment
payment.ukraine: All Ukrainian composers can participate in the competition free of charge. Upload of the payment receipt is optional.
payment.sanctioned: It is allowed to participate in the Competition free of charge for participants from all countries that fell on (or might fall till June 30th, 2022) the list of international transaction restrictions. Such participants will not receive a cash prize in case of winning unless the application fee is paid before the end of the registration deadline.

error.incorrectPass: The password you entered is incorrect.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
